sense.def:
Kadar so tla
paved
, so prekrita s kamnitimi ali betonskimi kockami.

seg.quote: ...a steep causeway paved with slabs of granite.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
paves the way for something else
, ustvari okoliščine, v katerih se lahko zgodi nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: His work paved the way for Burkitt's theories.
